bill.title: Relating to grants for infrastructure projects of rural cities.
bill.description: Directs Oregon Business Development Department to develop and administer matching grant program to assist rural cities in financing infrastructure projects for other than transportation-related infrastructure, including facilities for water service, sewer service, water and sewer treatment or waste management and other infrastructure necessary for maintenance of community health, hygiene, sanitation and livability. history.action: Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
Referred to Housing and Development, then Ways and Means.
